n: Mango, Orange, Grapefruit, Avocado, and Pistachio Salad
des: "After having a similar salad at a restaurant I had to try to re-create it."
ins: Toss the romaine lettuce with the balsamic vinaigrette and blue cheese crumbles. Place into a large salad bowl. Arrange the mango, grapefruit, orange, and avocado over the salad in a lovely pattern. Sprinkle with chopped pistachios to serve.
